additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Glycerin (plant derived), Sodium Coco Fatty Alcohol Sulphate (plant derived), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (plant derived), Cocamide MEA (plant derived), *Lemon Tea Tree Oil, Mandarin Peel Oil, Rosemary Oil, May Chang, Benzyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Dehydroacetic Acid, Eucalyptus Dives, Lavendin Oil. *Australian Native ingredient

description: Bosistos Lemon Tea Tree & Mandarin Antibacterial Hand Wash Refill
